comment: - Street Lighting / Streetlight Control Cabinet adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.Streetlighting/master/StreetlightControlCabinet/schema.json

contents.name: activePowerR
contents.comment: Active power consumed in R phase

contents.name: activePowerS
contents.comment: Active power consumed in S phase

contents.name: activePowerT
contents.comment: Active power consumed in T phase

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: brandName
contents.comment: Name of the cabinet's brand

contents.name: color
contents.comment: The color of the product

contents.name: cosPhi
contents.comment: Cosine of phi parameter

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform

contents.name: dateLastProgramming
contents.comment: Date at which there was a programming operation over the cabinet

contents.name: dateMeteringStarted
contents.comment: The starting date for metering energy consumed

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform

contents.name: dateServiceStarted
contents.comment: Date at which the cabinet controller started giving service

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: energyConsumed
contents.comment: Energy consumed by the circuits controlled since metering started (since dateMeteringStarted)

contents.name: energyCost
contents.comment: Cost of the energy consumed by the circuits controlled since the metering start date

contents.name: frequency
contents.comment: The working frequency of the circuit

contents.name: image
contents.comment: An image of the item

contents.name: intensityR
contents.comment: Electric intensity in R phase

contents.name: intensityS
contents.comment: Electric intensity in S phase

contents.name: intensityT
contents.comment: Electric intensity in T phase

contents.name: lastMeterReading
contents.comment: Value of the last reading obtained from the energy consumed metering system

contents.name: manufacturerName
contents.comment: Name of the cabinet's manufacturer

contents.name: maximumPowerAvailable
contents.comment: The maximum power available (by contract) for the circuits controlled by this cabinet

contents.name: meterReadingPeriod
contents.comment: The periodicity of energy consumed meter readings in days

contents.name: modelName
contents.comment: Name of the cabinet's model

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item

contents.name: nextActuationDeadline
contents.comment: Deadline for next actuation to be performed (programming, testing, etc.)

contents.name: powerFactorR
contents.comment: Power factor for phase R. Allowed values: A number between -1 and 1

contents.name: powerFactorS
contents.comment: Power factor for phase S. Allowed values: A number between -1 and 1

contents.name: powerFactorT
contents.comment: Power factor for phase T. Allowed values: A number between -1 and 1

contents.name: reactiveEnergyConsumed
contents.comment: Energy consumed (with regards to reactive power) by circuits since the metering start date

contents.name: reactivePowerR
contents.comment: Reactive power in R phase

contents.name: reactivePowerS
contents.comment: Reactive power in S phase

contents.name: reactivePowerT
contents.comment: Reactive power in T phase

contents.name: responsible
contents.comment: Responsible for the cabinet controller, i.e. entity in charge of actuating (programming, etc.)

contents.name: serialNumber
contents.comment: Serial number of the container

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object

contents.name: thdrIntensityR
contents.comment: Total harmonic distortion (R) of intensity in phase R. Allowed values: A number between 0 and 1

contents.name: thdrIntensityS
contents.comment: Total harmonic distortion (S) of intensity in phase S. Allowed values: A number between 0 and 1

contents.name: thdrIntensityT
contents.comment: Total harmonic distortion (T) of intensity in phase T. Allowed values: A number between 0 and 1

contents.name: thdrVoltageR
contents.comment: Total harmonic distortion (R) of voltage in phase R. Allowed values: A number between 0 and 1

contents.name: thdrVoltageS
contents.comment: Total harmonic distortion (S) of voltage in phase S. Allowed values: A number between 0 and 1

contents.name: thdrVoltageT
contents.comment: Total harmonic distortion (T) of voltage in phase T. Allowed values: A number between 0 and 1

contents.name: totalActivePower
contents.comment: Active power currently consumed (counting all phases)

contents.name: totalReactivePower
contents.comment: Reactive power currently consumed (counting all phases)

contents.name: voltageR
contents.comment: Electric tension in phase R

contents.name: voltageS
contents.comment: Electric tension in phase S

contents.name: voltageT
contents.comment: Electric tension in phase T

contents.name: annotations
contents.comment: Annotations about the item

contents.name: compliantWith
contents.comment: A list of standards to which the cabinet controller is compliant with (ex. IP54)

contents.name: features
contents.comment: A list of cabinet controller features.  Those technical values considered meaningful by applications. `astronomicalClock`. The control cabinet includes an astronomical clock to deal with switching hours. `individualControl`. The control cabinet allows to control street lights individually

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: refDevice
contents.comment: Reference to the device(s) used to monitor this control cabinet

contents.name: refStreetlightGroup
contents.comment: Streetlight group(s) controlled. List of references to entities of type StreetlightGroup

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
